articles.description: The FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup India 2020, originally scheduled for November, will now be held from February 2021-March 2021.
articles.content:
FIFA U-17 Women's World Cup India 2020 has been postponed to 2021 due to coronavirus pandemic and will be held in the February-March window, FIFA announced in their media release.

articles.description: Mahendra Singh Dhoni’s mother reacted to the latest photo of the cricketer that has been doing the rounds on social media. Dhoni’s image went viral when a video was uploaded on his daughter Ziva’s Instagram handle.
